faq-one-content: Theproart is product and service based eCommerce platform specially built for artists who are facing problems to sell their arts or showcasing thier arts.
faq-two-content: We are handling every sidejobs of artists like payment and delivery, so they can focus on their talents. We are building theproart to facilitate every kind of help to artists.
faq-three-content: As a artists, you only have to register your shop and start selling. listing of your art is as simple as post a feed in instagram.🤩🤩.., you can share your art gallery and shop on your social media which can give value to your arts.
faq-five-title: Problems facing by artists these days
faq-five-content: There is no central platform where they can make value from their arts, sell arts and showcasing arts. selling arts on social media is not a good option where artists have to do everything manually and not everyone is trustworthy.🙁
faq-four-content: By theproart platform, artists will be able to enter and explore digital art world, they can create NFTs of their own are which they can sell.🔥🔥
